description.value:
You perform a fascinating motion, moving and performing another action simultaneously. In such a fluid movement, you do not attract opportune strikes from your enemies.

Roll a performance check at a Normal DC for your level. The outcome of the roll determines its outcome:

Critical Success You are able to Stride up to your speed; during the movement, you can Strike, Cast A Spell, or Interact. Instead of these actions, you can instead Stride a second time. All these actions are done without provoking reactions (but it does not include avoiding reactions from casting Dazzling Spin itself). If you Cast a Spell, it must be a 1 or 2 action spell.

Success As critical success, but you can only Stride up to half your speed. If you choose to Stride a second time, you can move your full speed.

Failure You can only Stride up to half your speed without provoking reactions.

Critical Failure You fumble your spin, and the spell does nothing.
